Vibration Reduction: Lens Shift and Electronic VR, Motion Blur Reduction (Still Picture), Tripod Socket: 1/4 (ISO 1222), Charging Time: 2 hr 20 min (when Using Charging AC Adapter EH-71P and when No Charge Remains), Still Pictures: 350 Shots when Using EN-EL12, Electronically-controlled Preset Aperture (-1 AV) and ND Filter (-2 AV) Selections, Range: F2.8, F4.1, F8.2 Aperture 3 Steps, Movie (Actual Battery Life for Recording): 1 hr 15 min (1080 / 30 fps) when Using EN-EL12, 1 hr 20 min (1080/25 fps) when Using EN-EL12, Frame Coverage (Shooting Mode): 98% Horizontal and 98% Vertical (Compared to Actual Picture), Frame Coverage (Playback Mode): 100% Horizontal and 100% Vertical (Compared to Actual Picture), Communications Protocols: IEEE 802.11b: DBPSK/DQPSK/CCK, IEEE 802.11g: OFDM, IEEE 802.11n: OFDM, Range (Line of Sight): 30 m (32 yd), Operating Frequency: 2412 - 2462 MHz (1 - 11 Channels), Data Rates (Actual Measured Values): IEEE 802.11b: 5 Mbps, IEEE 802.11g: 17 Mbps, IEEE 802.11n: 17 Mbps, Security: Open/WPA2, Access Protocols: CSMA/CA, Shockproof: Cleared Testing Conditions, 3 Compliant with MIL-STD 810F Method 516.5 Shock, Waterproof: JIS / IEC Protection Class 8 (IPX8) Equivalent (Under Testing Conditions), Capacity to Shoot Images Underwater upto Depth of 18 m (59 ft) for 60 min, Electronic Compass: 16 Cardinal Points (Position Correction Using 3-axis Acceleration Sensor, Automatic Correction for the Deviated Angle and Automatic Offset Adjustment), Location Data: GPS / Receiving Frequency: 1575.42 MHz, Geodetic System: WGS 84 Glonass / Receiving Frequency: 1598.0625 - 1605.3750 MHz, Geodetic System: WGS 84, Barometer: Operating Range 500 - 1100 hPa, Altimeter: Operating Range -300 - 4500 m (-984 - 14, 760 ft), Depth Gauge: Operating Range 0 - 20 m (0 - 65 ft), Lithium Battery (EN-EL12)
